articles.author: Angus Whitley
articles.title: Fresh Macquarie Asset Management Bid Values Qube at $7.5 Billion - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Macquarie Asset Management offered to buy Qube Holdings Ltd. in a deal valuing the Australian logistics and shipping-containers company at A$11.6 billion ($7.5 billion).
articles.content:
Macquarie Asset Management offered to buy Qube Holdings Ltd. in a deal valuing the Australian logistics and shipping-containers company at A$11.6 billion ($7.5 billion).
